name: Perfect Cran-Lemon Petites
description: Your child’s lunch box will be the talk of the classroom with these easy, gluten-free, Cran-Lemon Petites! Their size is perfect for little hands, and they’re great for meal prep Sunday­­ – you get 30 pieces thanks to Epicure’s must-have Perfect Petites, with only a few minutes of active time in the kitchen. Leftovers can be frozen and pulled out for an afterschool nibble or for dessert after dinner.
preparation: Preheat oven to 350° F. Using Basting Brush, lightly oil Perfect Petites and place on Sheet Pan.
In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, yogurt, and oil. Stir in mix.
Bake 15 min. Cool 10 min; unmold and transfer to Cooling Racks.
To make glaze, mix icing sugar with lemon juice. Drizzle over warm petites.
